User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.7; rv:6.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0.1
Build ID: 20110830092941

Steps to reproduce:

Writing or viewing Farsi (Persian) language texts on some websites that contains half-space in them, using Firefox on Mac OS X 10.7.1.

(Additional information: In Farsi language, there is a character called half-space which acts like space but doesn't actually creates a space between to characters. Example is shown in the attachment)

Here is a text with half-space:
می‌نویسم
Here is a text with normal space:
می نویسم


Actual results:

Tested on Facebook, Google and Bugzilla text boxes.
Works fine on Firefox in Windows.
Works fine on Google search box on FF using Mac OS X. 
Display half-space as normal space on Facebook and Bugzilla text boxes using Mac OS X.


Expected results:

Should be displayed as shown in the attachment on other browsers or on FireFox in Windows.
